welcomeCurrentPoolSubText: Help us reach our goal! Every contribution makes a difference.
welcomeCurrentPoolDescriptionText:
The gauge below represents our current donation pool. Each donation is a fixed amount of {{var1}}, and our goal is to reach {{var2}}.

Once we hit this target, the entire( 1 ) amount will be donated back to YOU, one lucky donor.

It's a simple way to do good and potentially bring joy back into your life!

1 Note: A small transaction fee will be applied by the service provider for processing the donation. Check Terms and condition page

form.messageSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!
form.messageFailed: Failed to send your message. Please try again.
form.messageError: There was an error. Please try again.

qrCodeComponent.text: Scan QR Code with your wallet app to donate {{var1}} ETH to {{var2}}

donateComponent.text: Your donation helps reach the {{var1}} goal for the current donation pool. Together, we can make a difference!
donateComponent.successMessage: Your donation has been successfully initiated. Thank you!

socialDonations.mainText: Explore our social donation pools and make a difference today! Your contribution can create positive change in communities around the world.
